#   pip install homodyne-analysis[performance]  # JIT compilation
#   pip install homodyne-analysis[mcmc]         # MCMC sampling (CPU)
#   pip install homodyne-analysis[gpu]          # GPU acceleration
#   pip install homodyne-analysis[robust]       # Robust optimization
#   pip install homodyne-analysis[all]          # All scientific features
